metadata.notes: Pioneers of Purpose Assessment - £50,000 consulting service

athenaPrompt: Imagine culture and message perfectly aligned. Chat?

prompt.text: If your internal culture and external message feel misaligned...

body.fallback: Your brand is what people experience. Your purpose is why you exist. When those misalign, everything fractures. Culture suffers. Messaging rings hollow. We map your core reason to exist and cascade it through every system and customer touchpoint. Inside-out authenticity that strengthens both culture and message.

metadata.template: Eight weeks. Purpose architecture mapped across every system and touchpoint by {result}.

share.subject: Worth looking at: Pioneers of Purpose Assessment
share.body:
Hey,

I came across this and thought it might help with [ADD_YOUR_CHALLENGE_HERE].

It's called Pioneers of Purpose - they dissect your business from its core reason to exist and cascade that purpose through every system and customer touchpoint. Inside-out authenticity that actually strengthens both culture and message.

Eight weeks, starts at £50,000. They map purpose as operating system, not marketing tagline.

If we talk to them next week, we could have results by {deliveryDate} or earlier.

Here's the link: {url}

Worth a conversation?
